Note: Second cantus in Rolle’s Ego Dormio.
Subjects: Christ, prayers to; prayers, to Christ
_description: A prayer to Jesus — five 6-line stanzas (aabccb), some disarranged (one 7 ll., one 9 ll.)

TCD155.First Lines: Ihesu receyue my hertfor my desire þu art…
TCD155.Last Lines:
…wiþ outen ende with þeAnd of Joy euer to
                    synge
TCD155.Editions:
“Antiquities, Etc.: Hymns of Richard Rolle.” 
             British Magazine and Monthly Register of Religious and Ecclesiatical
                Information
         9 (1836): 499-503: 502.
